channel.title: Divine Login Problem
channel.description:
I Have Allready Posted This But I Didnt GEt Replay So I Will make new I have problem with loging to divine pk i lauched 2 servers but they say Error - failed to decode profile. Contact an admin for help.
maybe they'r guz of i changed 2 things in database because i would be Unable to register GREEN: ADDED RED:REMOVED
`forum_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
`killed` text NOT NULL, `killed` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
Register Errors: Field 'forum_id' doesn't have a default value when i change forum_id to 0 then it says Field 'killed' doesn't have a default value but here i can't change value to 0 because its not allowing
DATABASE [code]Error while executing query ALTER TABLE `demonik_lsd`.`user_credentials`MODIFY COLUMN `killed` TEXT CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_swedish_ci NOT DEFAULT 0; MYSQL ERROR number 1101 BLOB/TEXT column 'killed' can't have a default value[/code]

item.title: Divine Login Problem
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Why dont you just changed what you edited? I from time to time randomly get error failed to decode with demonik source, and when i restart services with wamp, logs in fine afterwards, If your database is not important at the moment either, why dont you trash it, and import a clean one? You probally already done this, i dont really know what to suggest, Useless info no doubt. Sorry

Read full topic

item.title: Divine Login Problem

item.description:
@SoundTable wrote:

I Have Allready Posted This But I Didnt GEt Replay So I Will make new
I have problem with loging to divine pk i lauched 2 servers
but they say
Error - failed to decode profile. Contact an admin for help.

maybe they’r guz of
i changed 2 things in database
because i would be Unable to register
GREEN: ADDED
RED:REMOVED

forum_id int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT ‘0’,

killed text NOT NULL,
killed int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT ‘0’,

Register Errors: Field ‘forum_id’ doesn’t have a default value when i change forum_id to 0 then it says
Field ‘killed’ doesn’t have a default value but here i can’t change value to 0
because its not allowing

DATABASE

Error while executing query ALTER TABLE `demonik_lsd`.`user_credentials`MODIFY COLUMN `killed` TEXT CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_swedish_ci NOT DEFAULT 0; MYSQL ERROR number 1101 BLOB/TEXT column 'killed' can't have a default value
